resources.privacySettingsDescription: Inviting friends to a Private wish list will change your privacy setting to Group. Sending a Private or Group wish list by email or sharing it on a social network will make it a shared list.
resources.privacySharedLabel: Anyone with a link can see this list. Only you and people you invite can see, comment, and add to this list.
resources.privacyGroupLabel: Only you and people you invite can see, comment, and add to this list.
resources.privacyPrivateLabel: Only you can see and add to this list.
resources.addToSpaceProductUpdatedSuccessMsg: This item was already in the wish list. We've updated the Date Added.
resources.spaceCreateMaxSpacesMsg: Problem creating wish list. You have exceeded the limit for the number of wish lists. Please delete an existing wish list before creating a new one.
resources.productAddMaxProductsMsg: Problem adding product to wish list. You have exceeded the limit for the number of posts in a wish list. Please delete an existing product from the destination wish list before adding a new one.
resources.commentAddMaxCommentsMsg: Problem creating comment. You have exceeded the comment limit for this post. Please delete an existing comment before creating a new one.
